content: Then He said to the disciples,
And the apostles said to the Lord, “Increase our faith.”
Now it happened as He went to Jerusalem that He passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee.
Then as He entered a certain village, there met Him ten men who were lepers, who stood afar off.
And they lifted up  voices and said, “Jesus, Master, have mercy on us!”
So when He saw  He said to them,  And so it was that as they went, they were cleansed.
And one of them, when he saw that he was healed, returned, and with a loud voice glorified God,
and fell down on  face at His feet, giving Him thanks. And he was a Samaritan.
Now when He was asked by the Pharisees when the kingdom of God would come, He answered them and said,
Then He said to the disciples,
And they answered and said to Him, “Where, Lord?”So He said to them,
